sense.gloss: kyogen, farce presented between noh plays or during the interlude of a noh play

sdata.j: この↑写真↑↓しゃしん↓をどう↑思↑↓おも↓う、↑今日↑↓|きょう↓↑現像↑↓げん|ぞう↓したのだ。
sdata.e: How do you like these photos? I had them developed today.

sdata.j: ↑今日↑↓|きょう↓↑現在↑↓げん|ざい↓、↑彼↑↓かれ↓から↑返事↑↓へんじ↓をもらっていない。
sdata.e: As of today, we haven't had an answer from him.
